item.description:
Our group just celebrated our first year! Join us for celebration and social chat. How has your LOA awareness increased since last Summer? There will be a $3 per person charge for this meeting as we will have dessert/drinks for our celebration.

Due to the size of the room, we are accepting yes or no responses only. If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Please honor the 16 spots we have for the reserved room. Looking forward to celebrating with everyone. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private room in the back.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: P.M. L.O.A. Meetup- It's Party Time!
